channel.title: google on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in google on The B0ardside

item.title: Craig Silverstein on the origin of Google
item.description: I only just learned about this guy Craig Silverstein, who was Google employee #3 after Larry and Sergey. There’s a ton more info about him if you go searching, but this is an ace little 10 minute video where he talks about the origins of google..

item.title: Eric Brewer on Container usage at Google
item.description: Eric Brewer’s keynote from Dockercon14 - Crazy stuff, definitely feels like Containers have gained mass momentum, and we’re about to undergo a major shift in Systems Architecture. Very exciting times!
